p: The prevention of accumulation of stagnant water in dark automobile tires and plants (preferred mosquito breeding sites); mosquito larvae areas to be sprayed and debris removal are the few vector source control measures that need to be undertaken.[ 77] Climatic changes (global warming and changes in humidity or rainfall) may also play a role in predicting vector abundance. Previous reported studies have suggested that rainfall had a positive and negative predilection on ZIKV and dengue isolation, respectively.[ 78]
